nodes.text: Viva Space Vegas! The History of the Marvelous Wheel

Viva Space Vegas! The History of the Marvelous Wheel is a series of reference articles currently ongoing at the StarWars.com blogs, written by Abel G. Peña and Rich Handley. Part 1 was released on September 26, 2013 and Part 2 on October 7, 2013. The content focused on the history of the recurring gambling location known as the Wheel. The title is a partial reference to the phrase "Viva Las Vegas."
